授業方法:
This course will be conducted in English only. 
Students will practice oral communication skills suitable for future business needs. The leather will provide all language and lesson materials to be used in class.
Class time will usually include pairwork and discussions, along with presentations and conversation activities. Homework and preparation assignments outside of class will be essential. We will also work with video to record video CVs and practice job interview skills. 
Active student interaction and participation essential for this course.

Google Classroom will be used for course information and assignment submissions. Therefore, students will NEED access to a computer at home or use a school computer lab to be able to properly complete and submit assignments. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are free).
